website_summaries.verdict: A simple arm machine bike hybrid that only works as hard as you do.
pros: Very lightweight, quiet, and easy to move and store
Nice built-in combination upper body work and cardio, with adjustable settings
cons: Peddles are small and don't serve much use in terms of resistance

customer_reviews.title: Both my husband and I have been using this and the workouts have been better than expected
customer_reviews.text: In the short time I have owned this bike, I have been surprised and impressed with its multiple functions. Both my husband and I have been using this and the workouts have been better than expected. It offers both cardio and strength building and the adjustable arms have been easy to use. I would recommend this bike for anyone out there looking for an affordable machine that is easy to put together and offers a variety of workout options. The online videos that come with the purchase have also offered a change of pace from what we have been doing. All in all it has been a great purchase for us.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Dowler

customer_reviews.title: Great, with one big issue
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for the price, but the pedals are small and don’t include straps, so my feet often slip off when using it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hall

customer_reviews.title: Poor piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived damaged, really cheap quality and not very robust. Amazon won't let me leave a bad review for this product which is illegal. The item is not worth the money and is very flimsy. Customer service has not helped me to return this item, or given me a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: I love the adjustable arms.
customer_reviews.text: This bike is great. I love being able to adjust the arms to so many positions, and the bike is totally silent. I can ride without waking my husband. Now I just need to build up my stamina. My cardiologist says 1 to 3 minutes is a good start.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally Love This Bike
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike and use it daily. It's well-built, yet pretty easy to move around. It's quiet, too, so it's easy to watch a show or listen to something on my phone while I bike. I love the upper body exercise I get while working out my legs. It's been a godsend for me since I got plantar facitis and can't walk fast enough to get my heart rate up. So helpful!
customer_reviews.author: T. Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: So far, this thing is a piece of junk. Spent and hour putting it together to find out it doesn't work. The pedals don't change tension as they are supposed to, and that defeats the purpose of this machine. We tried to troubleshoot it and found that the belts are not intact on the inside and it is very difficult to access. If I would have know this, o wouldn't have taken the time to put it together. Also, it was just a jumbled mess inside the box. Don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Haase

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable and very functional post surgical physical therapy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband after a devastating surgery. I noticed that every outpatient rehab had one of these.this one has the added benefit of arm tension bands too. He is also weak in his arms and needs to regain arm strength. It's nice. The bike actually tracks his time on it, which gives him a sense of accomplishment. The arm bungles can be used while on or off the bike and are adjustable to a few different postions. The seat is also adjustable. It feels pretty sturdy, and is easy enough to use. It's small enough to be the centerpiece of my small temporary gym I set up in the study while he rehabs.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Very good bike
customer_reviews.text: Very good work out! I really like it. Very quiet. Good buy. I really recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Yen Pham

customer_reviews.title: Overall decent cheap recumbent bike
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble, looks nice, good price. The loss of a star* is for lack of pedaling smoothness and weird tension adjustment. Kudos for the upper body workout bands!
customer_reviews.author: Diadem

customer_reviews.title: Problems after a couple months
customer_reviews.text: We only had it a few months and the pedal already had problems & was stripped out. I have been in contact with the company for over a month but am still waiting on them to send replacement parts
customer_reviews.author: Aarika Shields

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move around & store
customer_reviews.text: The bike works well & is easy to move & store when not in use. Our only complaint is that it is difficult to see the numbers on monitor. Needs back lighting and/or larger figures.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Best Bike Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have had 3 exercise bikes over the years and this one is the best by far. You can sit and watch tv and work the pedals and then when you wish you can use the butterfly upper body cords. They are adjustable in many positions therefore you can do many different stretches with them. This bike folds up for easy storage. I absolutely love it and highly recommend it. Not that hard to put together either.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: No happy
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this bike and I love it, BUT I've used consistently for 1 week... 30-40 min a night... and already the left pedal bolt is stripped and I had to tape it on (which didn’t work). Can I request a replacement pedal since this is barely 2 months old, this is absurd and unacceptable. This is what I can afford but this is the quality that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Logan

customer_reviews.title: Not machined properly.
customer_reviews.text: The top hole on the brace (behind the backrest) that holds the resistance arm was not machined properly. The bolt that is supposed to hold the arm to the brace will not thread, in fact it will not penetrate the hole at all. It's unfortunate because one has to complete about 75% of the installation before this egregious flaw is found. So we have to completely dismantle it and box all the pieces to get relief. In terms of wasting time with a product, this one is right up there.
customer_reviews.author: steven smith

customer_reviews.title: Simple, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Pros: great combo of arms and legs workout. Simple and easy to use. Cons: wish it came in all black instead of lime green and black. It may not hold up if you’re a bigger individual. It’s perfect for what I need. Very happy with my purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: It does what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to help me do low impact exercise. It does that. I let myself get pretty out of shape and feel that this bike is helping me a lot. Wider peddles would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: THCofer

customer_reviews.title: My TV chair
customer_reviews.text: I exercise while watching TV. Pedal resistance is not strong enough for me. May be good for some.
customer_reviews.author: 777 teacher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me except for the rollers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beginner total workout product! I really like that it comes with two free videos you can follow along and learn as you go. The only thing that is frustrating is the rollers on the back rail don't seem lined up correctly, so it's really hard for me to move the bike around. I've even turned them upside down to see if that would work and it's not much better. If they were angled just slightly differently it would be much easier to move when you want to store it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: This is a excellent bike for the price, good quality and stable. Easy to fold and store. I have put over 600 miles on mine so far with no issues. If you looking for something high impact...this is not it. It is made for low impact riding in my view. But it has done the job I bought it for to loose weight and low impact.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Byers

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It is very awkward and the bike part of this does not actually work well. The pulleys do not have a gauge to change the resistance. Very cheap and not worth the money. I'm putting it by the curb with a free sign on it to get rid of it. Don't do it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. I store it when not in use. I use it almost every day for 5-10 minutes. I’m still dealing with an IT band injury and the pedaling helps warm up the muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Taunya

customer_reviews.title: Bike but could not assemble Pedal. What a joke
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this within 2 hours. I follow assemble instruction step by step. Finally I made all and then the lest side pedal can not fit in. whole and bolt size could not match. No pedal bike haha...it is junk bike for iron. I could not stand this ugly iron any more. NO PEDAL BIKE, it is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike. My grandson assembled it i about an hour. I helped by getting all the packaging out of the way as he worked. It came with all the necessary tools. A friend who used to sell exercise bikes in his shop looked it over and said it was very good quality. Very smooth. The videos are a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: blueschix

customer_reviews.title: Great for cardio & loosing weight.
customer_reviews.text: The pedal was damaged. A friend of mine had 2 really work with the problem. It was used obviously. But overall I really love it! That is since my friend fixed the pedal.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed!!!

customer_reviews.title: Monitor never resets
customer_reviews.text: Bike would be better if there was a Clear or Reset button on the monitor. Even though the instructions says there is. There is not! I have to write down everything daily which is frustrating! Wish I knew this before purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Dee Lansaw

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Peddling is super easy and quiet, however tension pullers are a bit squeaky. Gives an awesome workout!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Convenient exercise machine
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and movable but also stable when in use. Nothing fancy with the crank resistance but works fine for me. I really enjoy the adjustable arm pulleys. If only interested in leg workout, would recommend a traditional stationary bike.
customer_reviews.author: RPEEZY

customer_reviews.title: Better then one would think!
customer_reviews.text: While it was a task to assemble, this stationary bike is FABULOUS. It's also very comfortable. A gym rat, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this exercise bike. The upper body work out is so cool. Sooooo easy to store with a 12X12 footprint.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike! Excellent quality for money and quiet which is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: My mom has knee problems and other bicycles is very difficult to ride. this one has the free front.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great workout, do-able assembly
customer_reviews.text: I love the workout! And the Wonder Bike. I assembled it myself. It was a stretch for me as I am not a mechanic. It took me about 2 hours. I really love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Jones

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: A piece of junk. Started gong issues immediately after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: vidyadi

product_meta.title: Stamina Wonder Exercise Bike | Build Upper and Lower Body Strength on One Machine | Includes Two Online Workout Videos, Chartreuse and Gray
product_meta.description: Double the Workout, Double the Fun Designed for convenience, portability and versatility, the Stamina Wonder Exercise Bike packs a workout that’s good for the whole body. Engage your core and legs with the bike. When you’re ready, take it to the next level with the included Wonder Arms. The Wonder Arms help you strengthen and tone your arms, shoulders, chest, and back. Exercises like chest press, curls, flies, and many more are possible with the smooth bungee cord and pulley system. Easily adjust between exercises by pulling the adjustment knob. The arms will automatically adjust to the same position on each side. The soft, padded grips are comfortable on your hands. Wonder Arms make for a convenient and comfortable upper body workout you can do on your exercise bike. Also included with this product is free online access to 2 on-demand workout videos. These workouts are guided by a certified personal trainer to help motivate and coach you towards your goals in the comfort of your own home. A Motivating Mentor The Stamina Wonder Exercise Bike tracks your results, so you can focus on the important part: getting things done. The simple, single-button multi-function monitor tracks metrics such as workout time, calories burned, speed and distance traveled. Scan mode will cycle through these during your workout. When you’re ready to increase the difficulty of the pedaling motion, the handy adjustable resistance dial lets you do it in a snap. Change the angle of your resistance workout with the adjustable Wonder Arms for a larger variety of upper-body exercises. Tailored to Your Needs Enjoy the comfort and adaptability of the Stamina Wonder Exercise Bike, designed for people of all shapes and sizes. A wide, cushioned seat, backrest and padded handlebars means less discomfort in the middle of your workout. The textured pedals and floor endcaps give you and your new bike added stability. Plus, the seat height is adjustable. When you’re done with your workout, use the built-in wheels for easy transport to the nearest storage area. It’s convenient. It’s fun. It’s affordable. If you want to take your biking to the next level with an added resistance workout, look no further than the Stamina Wonder Exercise Bike.
feature_bullets: Wonder arms add optional upper-body resistance workout with elastic bands. Adjustable arm angle for variety of resistance exercises
Easy-to-reach tension Dial lets you adjust bike workout intensity on-the-fly
Multi-function workout monitor displays workout time, calories burned, speed and distance
Wide, cushioned seat and backrest for optimal comfort

Also included with this product is free online access to 2 on-demand workout videos. These workouts are guided by a certified personal trainer to help motivate and coach you towards your goals in the comfort of your own home

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
